title: Sky Sports News in 60 Seconds: All the latest headlines
description: Catch up on all the big headlines from Sky Sports News in our video bulletin.
content: SSN in 60 Seconds brings you the major stories and breaking news in just one minute.In transfer news, get the latest on the swap deal involving Arsenal's Alexis Sanchez and Manchester United's Henrikh Mkhitaryan, plus Aaron Lennon's move from Everton to Burnley.Anthony Joshua promises to knockout Joseph Parker in their heavyweight unification clash, while Kell Brook hints at a possible showdown with Amir Khan.Also, there's the latest from the Australian Open, cricket as England arrive in Sydney and other top stories from across the sporting world.Hit play on the video at the top of the screen now for our quickfire round-up!
